segments.text: The water is just relentless, pouring over the sink's edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It creates this shimmering sheet down the cabinet doors.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can already envision the damage it's doing to the wood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle on the floor is expanding, reflecting the light from the window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It looks deceptively calm, but it's insidious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water damage is such an expensive and annoying thing to fix.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And she's standing right in it, oblivious to the rising tide.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s truly frustrating to watch this slow-motion disaster unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to turn off that faucet immediately!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This mess will be a nightmare to clean up later.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a grim sort of fascination with how much water can accumulate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of warped floors and ruined cabinets makes me shiver.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is a messy disgrace.
segments.speaker: PAR
